nodes.text: Star Wars Droids 2: The Ultimate Weapon is the second issue of the Star Wars Droids series of comics. The story is split up into three chapters, "The Ultimate Weapon Part 1," "The Ultimate Weapon Part 2: In the Company of Evil," and "The Ultimate Weapon Part 3: Shock Treatment."
Tig Fromm & Vlix Oncard kidnap the Idd family to get their hands on a high powered laser.
